title: Ababyeyi bagomba kurinda abana indwara y’umusonga, bonsa abana neza igihe cy’amezi atandatu abanza nta mfashabere, bagaburira abana indyo yuzuye kandi ihagije, bakanabakingiza inkingo zose ziteganyijw
content:
Ababyeyi bagomba kurinda abana indwara y’umusonga, bonsa abana neza
igihe cy’amezi atandatu abanza nta mfashabere, bagaburira abana indyo yuzuye kandi ihagije, bakanabakingiza inkingo zose ziteganyijwe.
Ababyeyi b’abana n’abandi babarera bagomba kubagaburira kandi bakabak-ingiza. Abajyana b’ubuzima bagomba gutanga amakuru ku mafunguro, isuku, gukingira n’uko hakwirindwa umusonga n’izindi ndwara.
